00023 #include "chipstream/AdjHomHiLoCelListener.h"
00024 //
00025 #include "chipstream/GenoUtility.h"
00026 #include "chipstream/QuantMethodReport.h"
00027 #include "chipstream/apt-geno-qc/GenoQC.h"
00028 //
00029 #include "stats/stats.h"
00030 
00031 using namespace std;
00032 using namespace affx;
00033 
00034 /** 
00035  * Process another cel files worth of data.
00036  */
00037 void AdjHomHiLoCelListener::newChip(affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCELData *cel) {
00038   std::vector<ChipSummary::Metric> metrics;
00039   m_SummaryStats.push_back(metrics);
00040   m_CelNames.push_back(cel->GetFileName());
00041 
00042   // Pass along CEL file to underlying cel listeners
00043   m_RandHiLo->newChip(cel);
00044   m_Set1HiLo->newChip(cel);
00045   m_Set2HiLo->newChip(cel);
00046 
00047   // Get Metrics out
00048   vector<ChipSummary::Metric> randMetrics = m_RandHiLo->getMetrics(m_CelNames.size()-1);
00049   vector<ChipSummary::Metric> set1Metrics = m_Set1HiLo->getMetrics(m_CelNames.size()-1);
00050   vector<ChipSummary::Metric> set2Metrics = m_Set2HiLo->getMetrics(m_CelNames.size()-1);
00051 
00052   // Compute Adjusted Hi Lo
00053   double adjhilo = 0;
00054   ///@todo all for "null" metric
00055   Metric rand("foo",2.2), set1("foo",2.2), set2("foo",2.2);
00056 
00057   if(!m_RandHiLo->getMetric(m_CelNames.size()-1, m_LabelRand, rand))
00058       Err::errAbort("Unable to find HomHiLo for " + m_LabelRand);
00059   if(!m_Set1HiLo->getMetric(m_CelNames.size()-1, m_LabelSet1, set1))
00060       Err::errAbort("Unable to find HomHiLo for " + m_LabelSet1);
00061   if(!m_Set2HiLo->getMetric(m_CelNames.size()-1, m_LabelSet2, set2))
00062       Err::errAbort("Unable to find HomHiLo for " + m_LabelSet2);
00063 
00064   if(fabs(set1.m_Double-set2.m_Double) > m_HiLoDiffCutoff)
00065       adjhilo = m_HiLoFailedValue;
00066   else
00067       adjhilo = rand.m_Double;
00068 
00069   // Populate the Summary Metrics
00070   m_SummaryStats[m_CelNames.size()-1].push_back(ChipSummary::Metric(m_Label, adjhilo));
00071 
00072   // Pass along underlying metrics
00073   for(int i = 0; i< randMetrics.size(); i++)
00074     m_SummaryStats[m_CelNames.size()-1].push_back(randMetrics[i]);
00075   for(int i = 0; i< set1Metrics.size(); i++)
00076     m_SummaryStats[m_CelNames.size()-1].push_back(set1Metrics[i]);
00077   for(int i = 0; i< set2Metrics.size(); i++)
00078     m_SummaryStats[m_CelNames.size()-1].push_back(set2Metrics[i]);
00079 
00080   setValid(true);
00081 }
